name: Kunal Shah
title: Founder & CEO
bio: Kunal Shah is the founder and CEO of CRED, a fintech platform that rewards creditworthy individuals. Previously, he founded FreeCharge, which was acquired by Snapdeal.

name: Nithin Kamath
title: Founder & CEO
bio: Nithin Kamath is the founder and CEO of Zerodha, India's largest stock broker. He bootstrapped the company to become a profitable unicorn without any external funding.
